DOC.criteria: Women high risk breast cancer , either member high risk breast ovarian cancer family , carcinoma opposite breast . Normal mammogram within past 3 month . No suspicious breast axillary lesion physical examination . No major cardiopulmonary , hepatic renal disorder .
